reviewText:
The world's largest and most spectacular Polynesian revue. Set to the backdrop of lush tropical foliage, cascading waterfalls and an erupting volcano. A cast of more than 100 enthusiastic Pacific Islanders presents Hawaii's most endearing Polynesian revue.

The Vibrant Spirit of Polynesia comes from the celebration of life among the people of Polynesia. You can relive that memorable feeling as you relax and enjoy the music and dances from Hawaii, Fiji, Samoa, Tonga, New Zealand and Tahiti.

Presented in its entirety, you'll love every minute of this world-famous performance.
